body_html:
updating glibc version is not a thing people do (it's not easy either).

@HMEIatJHU 0.3.1 actually supports CentOS 6.7 (I personally tested it myself), I am not sure why you are running into this error "GLIBC_2.17" not found.

But since you are running into the issue, easiest way of solving this is install from source.
